Articles.Content:
<p><img src="http://media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_mwu966ESQE1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>* **<iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/V4XdBFY17ks" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>This week’s mod is one of a highly imaginative variety. Remember when you’d grab garbage cans and boxes from throughout the neighborhood to play astronaut and travel to distant galaxies? You can now relive those days in <em><strong>KSP</strong></em>, thanks to <a href="http://bit.ly/1aTKJpt"><strong>Budget Rocket Parts</strong></a>. Here’s forum user, <strong>Bobhendley</strong> with a review:</p>

<p>The <strong>Kerbal Space Agency</strong> underwent MASSIVE budget cuts and was forced to sift through trash bags to keep the science flowing. Enter <a href="http://bit.ly/1aTKJpt"><strong>Bargain Rocket Parts</strong></a>. This handy little pack is all about doing big things through being frugal.</p>

<p><br/>The program’s standards for building reliable machinery has gone below the roof! You can send Jebediah into space to depressurize in a horribly smelly cardboard box! You can even use your neighbor’s grill as a space probe to explore the Stars!</p>

<p>There are lots of options for propulsion, too, whether it <br/>be a burning barrel, a fire extinguisher, or an aerosol can taken <br/>from the bathroom. This pack is certainly worth the time and small budget.</p>

Is it weird that after I got the mod, I built a real life replica of a rocket myself and pretended to be on a space mission?

Sitting in a cardboard box going "All systems nominal, ready for liftoff", followed by me making hissing and explosion sounds made my friends look at me weird.
Cool mod! Maybe you can convert the designs made with the mod to make real rockets!
I edited some of my techtree for my other mods just so I can start out with only this mod for a few nodes. This mod is genious!
Those Contraptions remind me of the things we've made at church for various kids programs. Sadly, none of them were quite so functional...

Yaay!

Looks like some of the stuff I wrote got shortened significantly, But Im happy Rowd Likes it!
Can't you please make a more in-depth spotlight of mods, when you only spotlight one mod? I'd happily volunteer for making mod spotlights, I just need a screen recorder.

Can't you please make a more in-depth spotlight of mods, when you only spotlight one mod? I'd happily volunteer for making mod spotlights, I just need a screen recorder.

This is no less then what we saw during KSP weekly. I am very happy with what I have. Keep it up Squad.
Hehehe, i knew from day one this mod will end in the spotlight. It's just too cute

Is it weird that after I got the mod, I built a real life replica of a rocket myself and pretended to be on a space mission?

Sitting in a cardboard box going "All systems nominal, ready for liftoff", followed by me making hissing and explosion sounds made my friends look at me weird.

You might suffer from 'Kerbal Syndrome'. Since it's not listed in the DSM your insurance will probably not cover any medication or therapy.

There is no known cure anyway, except perhaps avoiding all things electronic for at least 2 months.
Good thing they didn't change contractors on their space suits.
If it were only that easy in real life too.

If it were only that easy in real life too.

That'll be a disaster.

Think of all the environmentalists who would go Anger Mode 999999% because someone landed on Mars in a cardboard habitat and threw a coke bottle onto the ground before lifting off for Earth.

Just think.

That'll be a disaster.

Just think.

If you look at it that way, environmentalists and conspiracy theorists don't differ that much from each other... they both see coke bottles where they aren't supposed to be
